title: Inside Breakers Palm Beach resort: Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello's reported wedding venue [Photos] [Video]
text:
Celeb Travel 
Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello will reportedly wed in November. 
The couple became engaged in December but have refused to talk about their wedding plans, other than to admit it will be a big affair. 
According to Us Weekly magazine, the actors will exchange vows at Florida's Breakers Palm Beach resort on Nov. 22, 2015, during America's Thanksgiving celebrations. 
A heartfelt thank you to everyone who entered our Picture Perfect Paradise photo contest. It was such an honor to see... Posted by The Breakers Palm Beach on Tuesday, June 2, 2015 
A source tells the publication, "They want all their family and friends there celebrating. It'll be the most fun wedding ever!" 
Vergara had a test run of sorts last month, when she served as a bridesmaid at her friend's wedding. 
Need a getaway? This summer, stay two nights or longer & receive a $50 Nightly Resort Credit. Offered now through September 30. Escape to Palm Beach paradise: http://bit.ly/TheBreakersBookNow Posted by The Breakers Palm Beach on Saturday, July 11, 2015 
It's a gorgeous Friday for an al fresco lunch on the Flagler Steakhouse terrace. Don't fret, it's also fully climate-controlled...Peek at the menu & reserve your spot: http://flaglersteakhouse.com
